column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/c71093d23b21c4cee998834294c23da3a2c0c464 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
@laanwj I remember you didn't like this, right? If true just close it :).\n
@Diapolo  I don't like that it breaks the case in which you run both a testnet and mainnet instance. I'm fine with cleanups but they shouldn't break functionality.\n
